Quick Start â€‹

Get up and running with PAW in under 5 minutes:

bash
# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/decristofaroj/paw.git
cd paw

# Install dependencies
go mod download
npm install

# Start local node
./scripts/bootstrap-node.sh
./build/pawd start
